title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 239-8.1 - Test procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 239-8.1 - Test procedures

State Regulations
(a) Testing to
determine compliance with section
239-3.1
of this Part shall be
performed by using the procedures in
40 CFR sections
59.650
-
59.653
(see Table 1, section 200.9 of this Title). (b) Alternative methods that are shown to be
accurate, precise, and appropriate may be used upon written approval of the
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
239-8.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
